channel.title: 卫星实验室 on XLabs
channel.description: Recent content in 卫星实验室 on XLabs

item.title: Doks 1.3
item.description: Doks 1.3 — our first release of the new year — is here! This release includes restructured dependencies, deduplicated Bootstrap variables, and more.

item.title: Doks 1.2
item.description: Diagrams support, extended code blocks formatting, and more.

item.title: Doks 1.0
item.description: Doks 1.0 is a restructure release, making Doks more robust, reliable, and flexible.

item.title: Upgrade to v1.3
item.description: This guide will help you migrate from Doks v1.2 to Doks v1.3. Clean dependencies Clean dependencies currently installed to avoid conflicts.

item.title: Upgrade to v1.2
item.description: This guide will help you migrate from Doks v1.1 to Doks v1.2. Upgrade Doks You can upgrade to Doks 1.2 by running the folowing command:

item.title: Getting Started
item.description: Doks is a full-featured documentation theme built on top of the Hyas framework. This guide will help you get started with a new project.

item.title: Environmental Impact
item.description: Estimates for the climate impact of the web industry range from between 2% and 4% of global carbon emissions, roughly equivalent to the emissions of the airline industry.

item.title: Upgrade to v1
item.description: This guide will help you migrate from Doks v0.5 to Doks v1. Other migration guides Need to upgrade a v1.x project?

item.title: Project Structure
item.description: This guide will show you how a Doks project is organized and what the different files in your project do.

item.title: Authoring Content
item.description: Doks supports the full range of Markdown syntax in .md files as well as frontmatter YAML, TOML, or JSON to define metadata such as a title and description.
